Title: SNAP benefits set to expire this week. And, Jamaica braces for a Category 5 storm
Description:

And, Jamaica braces for Hurricane Melissa to bring over 170 miles per hour winds.

Title: Amazon set to cut 14,000 jobs from corporate workforce
Description: Amazon says that it will cut an estimated 14,000 jobs from its corporate workforce as it focuses on “reducing bureaucracy, removing layers, and shifting resources."
